thread.title: Erik Sorensen
thread.title_full: Nevada Corporate Headquarters, Inc. reviewed by Erik Sorensen

author: Erik Sorensen
title: Erik Sorensen
text:
Great experience I im new to real estate investment and all the legalities. NCH took the time to explain everything and answered every question we had. Having someone there can really make a difference in your confidence especially when you know all you paperwork is done correctly. Thank you so much..
Erik
